==Trivia==
* Surtr's Portent's Japanese name "炎王の脅嚇" can be translated as "Flame King's Menace", connecting Surtr's Portent to the [[Menace Passives]], unlike {{St|Surtr's Menace}}, which is more connected to the [[Threaten Passives]].
